mean_en: a sea creature with a hard shell, a long body divided into sections, eight legs and two large claws (= curved and pointed arms for catching and holding things). Its shell is black but turns bright red when it is boiled.
sentence: During our trip to the coast I really enjoyed having lobster.
sentence_trans: 在我们前往海滩期间，我很开心地吃了另一只龙虾。
